resources.string: We are into plastic planters business for over 20 years, running one of the most successful flower pots business across India and Abroad. At gardens Need, we are a Manufacturer, supplier, Exporter and Trader of high quality garden products that includes Fancy Planters, Nursery Planters, Coco Planters, Iron Pots, Iron Planters, Roto Planters, Solor Light, Water Cane, Water Spray, Plastic Planters, Hanging Baskets, Bottom Plates, Nursery Poly Bags, Gardening Accessories and Window Planters. We are the leading brand in planters and plastic flower pots business – we have customers in all cities.

We are the leading brand in planters and plastic flower pots business – we have customers in all cities. Our line of flower pots is designed to help grow stunning displays of annuals or perennials. Because flower gardeners know that container plants have special needs, we have developed self-watering, durable planters that help your flowers thrive. gardens need seeks to build the most customer-centric online destination for customers to find and discover virtually anything they want to buy online by giving them more of what they want – vast selection, low prices, fast and reliable delivery, and a trusted and convenient experience; and provide sellers with a world-class products.
B - 44, Double story quarters, Idgah road, New Delhi - 110006, India
